resources.string: The current price of the crypto multiplied by its current circulating supply
The number of cryptos that are currently liquid and in circulation.
The maximum number of cryptos that will ever be issued.
The all-time-high/low trading price in selected currency.
The high/low trading price 24 hours in the selected currency.

Navigating the intricate world of cryptocurrency just got easier!
With CryptoPal Crypto Glossary at your fingertips, you can effortlessly decode the maze of terms and jargon. From "blockchain" to "decentralization", each definition is crafted for clarity and simplicity. Dive in, demystify the complexities, and embrace the joy of truly understanding the world of crypto.
